Levelizer aides you in taking level photos through haptic feedback.\n\nThis accessibility service is used to react when a whitelisted camera app is opened.
Levelizer aides you in taking level photos through haptic feedback. When using your favorite camera app, Levelizer will gently buzz until you\'re holding your phone straight.
Levelizer needs accessibility permissions in order to work. Please enable it.
In order to enable a screen overlay to toggle Levelizer from your camera, it needs permission to draw over other apps.
Display an orientation arrows on top of your camera app
Provide a button on top of your camera app to disable Levelizer
In the following screen, locate Levelizer under accessibility services and tap on it.
Flip the switch to the on position and you\'re done!
You\'re done! Levelizer will now give haptic feedback for camera apps on your whitelist.
Add apps to the list of known camera apps.
Add camera apps to this list to make sure Levelizer provides feedback while they\'re running.
